roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with core NLP capabilities and context-aware responses.

children.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Core
children.description: Introducing the core NLP capabilities for language understanding.

children.title: Resolved issues with entity recognition.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the recognition of entities.

children.title: Fixed errors in intent detection.
children.description: Corrected errors in detecting user intents.

children.title: Added support for sentiment analysis.
children.description: Introduced sentiment analysis to understand user emotions.

children.title: Improved accuracy of language understanding models.
children.description: Enhanced the accuracy of models for better language understanding.

children.title: Context-Aware Responses
children.description: Improving the relevance of responses by tracking context.

children.title: Corrected issues with context retention across sessions.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the retention of context across multiple sessions.

children.title: Fixed bugs in context switching.
children.description: Resolved issues with switching context during conversations.

children.title: Introduced multi-turn conversation capabilities.
children.description: Added support for handling multi-turn conversations effectively.

children.title: Improved context tracking for better response relevance.
children.description: Enhanced context tracking to improve the relevance of responses.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for multi-language support and API performance optimization.

children.title: Multi-Language Support
children.description: Adding support for multiple languages and improving translation features.

children.title: Resolved translation inaccuracies.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the accuracy of translations.

children.title: Fixed bugs in language detection.
children.description: Resolved issues with detecting the user's language.

children.title: Added support for 10 new languages.
children.description: Introduced support for ten additional languages.

children.title: Improved translation speed and accuracy.
children.description: Enhanced the speed and accuracy of translation processes.

children.title: API Performance Optimization
children.description: Improving the performance and scalability of the API.

children.title: Corrected latency issues during peak usage.
children.description: Fixed problems causing latency during high usage periods.

children.title: Fixed bugs in request throttling.
children.description: Resolved issues with throttling requests to the API.

children.title: Improved API response times.
children.description: Enhanced the response times of the API for better performance.

children.title: Enhanced scalability to handle higher request volumes.
children.description: Improved scalability to manage larger volumes of API requests.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with advanced NLP features, user personalization, and enhanced security.

children.title: Advanced NLP Features
children.description: Introducing advanced natural language processing capabilities.

children.title: Resolved issues with named entity disambiguation.
children.description: Fixed problems with disambiguating named entities.

children.title: Fixed errors in syntactic parsing.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting syntactic parsing of text.

children.title: Introduced custom entity recognition.
children.description: Added support for recognizing custom entities in text.

children.title: Added support for advanced intent customization.
children.description: Introduced advanced customization options for intent recognition.

children.title: User Personalization
children.description: Enhancing the personalization features for better user interaction.

children.title: Corrected issues with user profile management.
children.description: Fixed problems with managing user profiles.

children.title: Fixed bugs in personalized response generation.
children.description: Resolved issues with generating personalized responses.

children.title: Added support for user-specific conversation history.
children.description: Introduced features to track and use user-specific conversation history.

children.title: Implemented personalized recommendations based on user interactions.
children.description: Added support for making personalized recommendations to users.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Improving security features for better data protection.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in API authentication.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in API authentication processes.

children.title: Fixed issues with data encryption.
children.description: Resolved problems with data encryption methods.

children.title: Implemented token-based authentication.
children.description: Introduced token-based authentication for secure access.

children.title: Added support for OAuth2 for secure API access.
children.description: Introduced OAuth2 support for secure API access.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for integration with external systems and advanced analytics.

children.title: Integration with External Systems
children.description: Improving integration capabilities with external systems.

children.title: Resolved issues with CRM integration.
children.description: Fixed problems with integrating CRM systems.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data synchronization with third-party services.
children.description: Resolved issues with synchronizing data with third-party services.

children.title: Added support for integrating with popular CRM systems.
children.description: Introduced support for integration with popular CRM systems.

children.title: Implemented seamless data exchange with external databases.
children.description: Added features for seamless data exchange with external databases.

children.title: Advanced Analytics and Reporting
children.description: Enhancing analytics and reporting features for better insights.

children.title: Corrected errors in conversation analytics.
children.description: Fixed problems with analytics of conversations.

children.title: Fixed bugs in report generation.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the generation of reports.

children.title: Introduced real-time conversation analytics.
children.description: Added real-time analytics for monitoring conversation performance.

children.title: Added customizable reporting features for user insights.
children.description: Introduced customizable reporting options for better user insights.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with AI-driven response optimization, voice integration, and customizable conversation flows.

children.title: AI-Driven Response Optimization
children.description: Introducing AI-driven features for optimizing responses.

children.title: Resolved issues with response ranking algorithms.
children.description: Fixed problems with algorithms for ranking responses.

children.title: Fixed errors in feedback loop for learning.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the feedback loop for learning from interactions.

children.title: Introduced AI-driven response suggestions.
children.description: Added features for suggesting responses using AI.

children.title: Added support for continuous learning from user interactions.
children.description: Introduced continuous learning from user interactions to improve responses.

children.title: Voice Integration
children.description: Enhancing support for voice-based interactions.

children.title: Corrected issues with voice recognition accuracy.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the accuracy of voice recognition.

children.title: Fixed bugs in text-to-speech conversion.
children.description: Resolved issues with converting text to speech.

children.title: Added support for voice-based interactions.
children.description: Introduced features for interacting with the chatbot using voice.

children.title: Implemented advanced voice recognition for natural conversations.
children.description: Enhanced voice recognition capabilities for natural conversations.

children.title: Customizable Conversation Flows
children.description: Introducing features for customizing conversation flows.

children.title: Resolved bugs in flow configuration.
children.description: Fixed problems with configuring conversation flows.

children.title: Fixed errors in conditional branching logic.
children.description: Resolved issues with the logic for conditional branching in conversations.

children.title: Introduced a visual editor for conversation flows.
children.description: Added a visual editor for designing conversation flows.

children.title: Added support for complex conditional logic in conversations.
children.description: Introduced support for complex conditional logic in conversation flows.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for multi-channel support and user feedback mechanism.

children.title: Multi-Channel Support
children.description: Adding support for chatbots on multiple channels and platforms.

children.title: Resolved issues with channel-specific integrations.
children.description: Fixed problems with integrating the chatbot on specific channels.

children.title: Fixed bugs in message formatting across channels.
children.description: Resolved issues with formatting messages for different channels.

children.title: Added support for chatbots on social media platforms.
children.description: Introduced support for deploying chatbots on social media platforms.

children.title: Implemented unified messaging across web, mobile, and social media.
children.description: Added features for unified messaging across various platforms.

children.title: Enhanced User Feedback Mechanism
children.description: Improving the user feedback collection and analysis process.

children.title: Corrected errors in feedback collection.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the collection of user feedback.

children.title: Fixed bugs in user feedback analysis.
children.description: Resolved issues with analyzing user feedback data.

children.title: Introduced real-time feedback prompts.
children.description: Added features for collecting real-time feedback from users.

children.title: Added support for integrating user feedback into chatbot training.
children.description: Introduced support for using user feedback to improve chatbot training.
